title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: When someone has an experienced in something they become aware of it and learn their mistakes, experience is a first attempt which puts you on track for succesful repeat of an action ,experience comes with positive sucess and negative failure at first instance.If you are succesful at the first experience, it becomes a part of you,when taking more attempt ,if you fail at the first experience it makes you learn while you become careful when taking another step noting your mistakes. Experience is the teacher of all, experience gives you edge over all situations. A failed investment in crypto will make you learn and make research & finding before investing in next,you will check how trust worthy the investment his when next.A kid who puts hand in hot water or fire knows it pain and learns his lessons ,when next he sees hot water or fire he flees from it .Failure in first attempt gives you lessons,you become careful when attempting the next.

comments.author: Stella Mese
comments.body: Yes, experience is a teacher, and surely most people experience failure, including myself, often learn a lot from experience because if there is no experience, of course we will not get valuable lessons and because we have experience we will not fall a second time.

comments.author: Swensy
comments.body: That's right, without experience, we learn so that then do not make mistakes or do less

comments.author: Lloydm
comments.body: Failures break people, you have to treat the experience right

comments.author: whatspopping
comments.body: As the proverb goes, experience is the mother of wisdom. I agree, but I admit, sometimes I need more than one "lesson" on the road to getting wise.

comments.author: Bazzu
comments.body: indeed from experience we will learn to be better in the future,, and I also learn a lot from bitter experience,, because in the past I always failed when investing in crypto but I did not give up with the failures that I experienced, until finally I started to think about the causes of my failure until I finally found my mistake, and I finally succeeded with my investment, so obviously experience is a good teacher.

comments.author: Beefcake
comments.body: Even better, you can learn from others' mistakes. Start simple: if it looks too good to be true, it probably is. Anyone offering x% guaranteed return is probably up to something. Ponzi schemes are destined to fail. Alt coins are very unlikely to make you rich like early adopters of btc got rich, so don't chase them because you will probably lose.  I guess that's enough for now

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Like anything in life most people are not perfect or perceived an expert when they start a new skill or job. Practise makes perfect, as the well known saying goes. Work hard & listen to others who can give good advice until you are competent & able to carry out the task(s) on your own.

comments.author: Tallupooh
comments.body: Yes, experience is a teacher. Learning from past failures and mistakes will make us better now and in the future. Stay patient, try and keep the spirit. from that experience we will become more observant of what we are doing now.

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Indeed experience is the best teacher, but one must not wait to make a mistake before a learn can be learn from it, others mistake can be an experience to the other.sometimes I keep on making the same mistake over and over again and most times I keep on asking myself if my own case is different, but I realize its not all mistake that we make, that we must learn from.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: One should never stop themselves from making a mistake as it makes us who we are.  We cannot erase any of life’s experiences.It gives the confidence to push forward. It is a part of being human, developing, and growing.

comments.author: Chelsat
comments.body: That's life, if you don't make mistakes, nothing will work out

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: yes, experience is something valuable for ourselves and our lives. and if we have the experience of failure, it means that failure is very valuable for us to learn.
